hero.name: jan Sijan
hero.intro: toki! mi jan Sijan. nimi mi li AnalogCyan lon ilo sona. mi pali e ilo pona. mi pona e ilo ike. mi lukin e ijo nasa. o sona mute

meta.description: lipu mi pi ijo pali en ijo sona.

about.title: lipu sona
about.intro: toki! mi jan Sijan. nimi mi li AnalogCyan. mi jan meli. mi jan pi lawa ante. mi pilin pona tan ni. mi pilin pona tan awen sina.
about.body1: tenpo mute la, mi pali e ilo sona. mi lukin e ijo nasa. mi pilin pona tawa ijo sin. mi pilin pona tawa musi lili. mi pilin pona mute tawa ilo sona pi pilin luka. ilo sona ni li pali sona li jo e ante.
about.body2: sina wile lukin e ijo pali mi anu ijo kalama mi la, o lukin e lipu ni. o tawa nasin lon anpa.

projects.intro: Explore some of the projects I've created or contributed to; click on any to learn more! For code-related projects, visit my GitHub; for non-code projects, explore around my site! I'm also a part of Jonnil Games, where I manage the website and help make games. Unless otherwise noted, code on this website is licensed under AGPLv3 and content is licensed under CC BY-SA 4.0.

asylum.title: Juni's Asylum
asylum.desc: A horror adventure game with platforming, puzzles, and branching narrative. Made by Jonnil Games.

sticky.title: Sticky Paws
sticky.desc: A 2D platformer game about a cat that can climb anything! Made by Jonnil Games.

dor.title: DNS-over-RNG
dor.desc: A very cursed DNS server implementation inspired by the various DNS-over-protocol standards.

mobs.title: More Vanilla Mobs
mobs.desc: Minecraft 1.17+ data pack that implements some of the mobs that technically exist in the game, but don't appear in survival.

photos.title: Photos
photos.body: A space for photo sets, experiments, and visual notes. I’ll be adding galleries and highlights here soon.
photos.prompt: Want a peek in the meantime?

music.title: kalama musi
music.body: sina ken lukin e mi lon ma mute pi kalama musi. nasin ale ni li sin ala. taso, nasin ale ni li lon ni.
music.body2: sina wile sona e kalama musi mi lon tenpo ni la, o lukin e Last.fm lon sewi lipu ni. ni li tawa nasin mi lon Last.fm.
music.prompt: tenpo ni la, ni li nasin mi pi kalama musi:
music.clientsBody: mi awen e kulupu kalama musi mi. ni li lon Valkyrie, ilo sona mi. mi kepeken Navidrome tawa ni.
music.clientsBody2: lipu kalama musi ale pi pilin pona mi li lon ni. lipu ni li pona mute. mi wile jo e kalama musi mi. mi pilin ike tawa kepeken kalama musi pi tenpo lili. sina awen e kulupu kalama musi sina la, kulupu sina li sina. sina jo e kalama musi sina li lawa e ona.
music.clientsBody3: ni li pona tawa sina la, ni li ike ala mute. sina wile jo e lipu kalama musi sina. sina wile jo e ilo sona. sina wile jo e ilo tawa lukin e kulupu sina.
music.clientsLead: ni li ilo tawa lukin e kulupu mi. mi wile e ni:

lastfmCapsule.title: Last.fm
lastfmCapsule.profile: o tawa nasin mi lon Last.fm
lastfmCapsule.loadingBody: ni li kama jo e sona sin…
lastfmCapsule.liveBody: mi kute e kalama musi lon Last.fm lon tenpo ni.
lastfmCapsule.idleBody: mi kute ala lon tenpo ni. ni li sona pi tenpo pini lili.
lastfmCapsule.errorBody: mi ken ala jo e sona tan Last.fm lon tenpo ni. o kama sin lon tenpo lili.
lastfmCapsule.noData: sona pi kute mi lon tenpo pini lili li lon ala lon tenpo ni.
lastfmCapsule.kickerRecent: kalama musi pi tenpo pini lili

footer.quote: sina ken awen lon nasa ala nasa?
